title: Did the National Republican Army support an "open-pregnancy" ban in 1967 in California?
subtitle: A law prohibiting the carrying of loaded firearms was enacted in 1967 with the support of the National Guns Association, after "black leopards" in the capital of California earlier that year.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The National Gun Association supported the adoption in 1967 of a bill in the California Legislature prohibiting the carrying of firearms in public.
